snippet: Samantha Power, the American ambassador to the United Nations, on Wednesday urged more support for existing African and French troops in the Central African Republic on the eve of a United Nations vote to create a peacekeeping mission.
abstract: Samantha Power, American ambassador to United Nations, urges more support for existing African and French troops in the Central African Republic on the eve of a United Nations vote to create a peacekeeping mission.
lead_paragraph: Samantha Power, the American ambassador to the United Nations, on Wednesday urged more support for existing African and French troops in the Central African Republic on the eve of a United Nations vote to create a peacekeeping mission.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Envoy Urges Support for Peacekeeping Troops
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Envoy Urges Support for Peacekeeping Troops
